<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Working *************Do not Edit*****************</description>
        <name>UI action -  multiple assessmnet// Work</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[ var metType = [];
 var i;

 var survey_response = new GlideRecord('asmt_assessment_instance');
 survey_response.addQuery('trigger_id', '2b90818a47edb190020ba9f8536d437a');
 survey_response.addQuery('state=complete'); // need to enable at last
 //survey_response.addQuery('metric_type.display_value', 'Review Assessment')
 survey_response.addQuery('ORDERBYtaken_on');
 survey_response.query();
 while (survey_response.next()) {
     var compASMT = survey_response.getValue('sys_id');
     metType.push(compASMT);

 }

 var Review = metType[0];
 var Review_ideation = metType[1];
 var Demand = metType[2];

 gs.print('Review' + Review);
 gs.print('Review_ideation' + Review_ideation);
 gs.print('Demand' + Demand);]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>Gokul Nath</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-09-29 12:12:52</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>e7ae31064765f190020ba9f8536d435b</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>UI action -  multiple assessmnet// Work</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_e7ae31064765f190020ba9f8536d435b</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>Gokul Nath</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-09-29 12:12:52</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
